name: behalf-chrome-extension
description: Chrome extension for managing browser tasks and communication with Cloudflare worker

scripts.test-connection: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const { Pool } = require('pg'); const pool = new Pool({ connectionString: process.env.DATABASE_URL, ssl: { rejectUnauthorized: false } }); pool.query('SELECT NOW()').then(result => { console.log('✅ Database connection successful:', result.rows[0]); pool.end(); }).catch(err => { console.error('❌ Database connection failed:', err.message); process.exit(1); });"
scripts.setup-d1: wrangler d1 create behalf && wrangler d1 execute behalf --file=worker/d1-schema.sql
